content.rendered:
This Risk Disclaimer (“Disclaimer”) applies to the Professional Profits Mastermind Course (“Course”), the Professional Profits Discord server, all Professional Profits social media accounts, and all content, services, and products available at or through Professional Profits, a company owned by Victoria Duke (“Owner”).

Not Financial Advice

The information provided by Victoria Duke and any information posted within the Professional Profits Discord server or on the respective Professional Profits social media accounts are for educational commentary and informational purposes only and do not constitute financial advice. Victoria Duke and Professional Profits are not registered as financial advisors, brokers, dealers, or any other regulated entity in any jurisdiction. Victoria Duke and Professional Profits do not have access to insider information. This is not an offer to buy and sell futures.

Risk of Trading and Investing

Trading and investing in financial markets involves a substantial degree of risk and should not be undertaken without understanding all the risks involved. There is always the possibility of losing some or all of your initial investment or even more than your initial investment where leveraging or borrowing is used. Therefore, you should not invest money that you cannot afford to lose. Professional Profits and Victoria Duke will not ever trade your account for you.

No Guarantees

While we strive to provide accurate information, we make no representations or guarantees, express or implied, that participation in the Course will result in you achieving certain results or earnings. Any forward-looking statements or forecasts are based on assumptions and actual results may vary..

Indemnity

By using the Course, you agree to indemnify and hold harmless Victoria Duke, Professional Profits, and any of our affiliates against any and all claims, suits, actions, or other proceedings brought against them based on or arising from any action taken by you in investing and trading. You also agree to pay any damages, attorneys’ fees, and costs awarded against or incurred by or in connection with or arising from any such claim, suit, action, or proceeding attributable to any such claim.

Your Responsibility

You bear responsibility for your own investment research and decisions and should seek the advice of a qualified securities professional before making any investment

Last Updated: July 21, 2023
